channel.title: Need help
channel.description: well i need a program that will allow my admins to restart the server from their computer...anyone know of any good ones?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 20, 2006, 03:51:16 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know of any??

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Well actually if other admins could restart computer most endserver.bat 's dont usually dont work. Also even if the admins could use a command, an issue could happen adn they couldnt log onto to restart server.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

[quote=“brent3412, post:2, topic:19185”]yes

send them a copy of ure server[/quote]

No. Then all the character files will not be up to date.

The solution for this would take a lil thought. Maybe make a restart command that only admins can do. Then somehow make the command end the server then start it again. If you already have an endserver.bat, then this shouldn’t be tough.

Read full topic
